# 2D Histogram in R

```{r, message=FALSE}


library(plotly)
s <- matrix(c(1, -.75, -.75, 1), ncol = 2)
obs <- mvtnorm::rmvnorm(500, sigma = s)
plot_ly(x = obs[,1], y = obs[,2], type = "histogram2d", filename="r-docs/2d-histogram")


```
